title: Joe Rogan Signs $100-200 Million Exclusive Deal with Spotify
summary: Spotify signs exclusive multi-year licensing deal with Joe Rogan worth reported $100-200 million, marking largest podcast acquisition and creating financial dependency

sources.title: Joe Rogan Says $100 Million Spotify Deal Feels Gross
Joe Rogan's Spotify Deal Was Actually Worth $200 Million (Report)
'The Joe Rogan Experience' Launches Exclusive Partnership with Spotify
Spotify said to have paid $200million for Joe Rogan podcast deal, twice the figure previously reported
Joe Rogan's Spotify Deal Renewal Worth Up to $250 Million, Podcast Will No Longer Be Exclusive

notes: Deal made JRE exclusive to Spotify. Created financial dependency. Platform control over most influential podcast. Beginning of content shift toward controversy.
